entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow ending this afternoon then cloudy. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 10. Wind chill near minus 23. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Blowing snow over exposed areas early this evening. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 24 February 2023
